document.docAuthor: Crispolon, Elorde Jr. S., Yap, Sheryl A. & Soulier-Perkins, Adeline
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the endemic Philippine Poeciloterpa Stål (Hemiptera: Cercopidae) with description of four new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the endemic Philippine Poeciloterpa Stål (Hemiptera: Cercopidae) with description of four new species

bibRefCitation.author: Schmidt, E.
bibRefCitation.refString: Schmidt, E. (1920) Neue Zikaden von den Philippinen, Sumatra und Java. (Rhynchota-Homoptera). In: Entomologische Zeitung. Vol. 81. Herausgegeben von dem entomologischen Vereine zu Stettin, Stettin, pp. 43 - 56.

subSubSection.paragraph: Schmidt (1920) described and provided a general description with few details on the male terminalia. However the male holotype was not dissected. Here, we provide for the first time, the detailed description and illustration of male terminalia ( Figs 67–72 ), with pictures of the type specimen with its labels and preparations ( Figs 60–66 ).
Type material examined. Holotype ♂: [Mt Banahao P. I. Baker], [4159], [ Poeciloterpa latipennis Stål, ♂., Edm. Schmidt. Determ. 1920], [Typus] (MIIZ).

caption.paragraph: FIGURES 60–66. Poeciloterpa latipennis, holotype. 60. Habitus, dorsal view. 61-62. lateral view. 63. frontal view. 64. Mount- ed tegmina, 65. Mounted hindwing 66. Labels. Photographed by Laurent Fauvre © 2017 MNHN.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 67–73.
Poeciloterpa latipennis ,
holotype. 67. Male terminalia, lateral view. 68. Pygofer and anal tube, lateral view. 69. Subgenital plate, lateral view, LP: lateral plate, IP: intermediate plate. 70. Paramere, lateral view. 71. Aedeagus, lateral view, ae: apical extension, pp: posterior protrusion. 72. Subgenital plates and parameres, ventral view.73. Tegmina.

.
Distribution. Philippines : Luzon and Mindanao Islands ( Fig. 148 ).
